name: PushLoyaltyProgram_Async
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Api` with functionality `PushLoyaltyProgram:None`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-BackendSystemID
headers.description: The ID of the backend system that is used to resolve the IDs.

request_samples.name: JSON
request_samples.sample:

        {
          "Data": {},

        }
      ],
      "Description": "string",
      "Enabled": true,
      "EndDate": "2024-07-05",
      "ID": "string",
      "MarketingDescription": "string",
      "Name": "string",
      "OrganizationUnitSetID": "string",

    "key": "any valid json value"

    "key": "any valid json value"

  "PointPendingPolicyType": "string",

          "ExactMatch": true,
          "From": "string",
          "IncludeMissing": true,

          "Values": [
            "any valid json value"

      "ID": "string",
      "Name": "string",
      "OverallQuantityLimitPerOrder": 123,
      "OverallQuantityLimitPerUser": 123,

C.name: ID
C.description: This is the ID of a `LoyaltyProgramCondition`

F.name: OverallQuantityLimitPerOrder
F.description: The quantity limit over the entire product limitation product set per order.

F.name: OverallQuantityLimitPerUser
F.description: The quantity limit over the entire product limitation product set per user.

F.name: ProductIDs
F.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

F.name: ProductSearchID
F.description: This is the ID of a `ProductSearchTemplate`

F.name: QuantityLimitPerOrder
F.description: The quantity limit per product within the product limitation product set per order.

F.name: QuantityLimitPerUser
F.description: The quantity limit per product within the product limitation product set per user.

E.name: ID
E.description: This is the ID of a `LoyaltyProgramPaymentType`

E.name: PaymentTypeID
E.description: This is the ID of a `PaymentType`

E.name: UserBudgetDeduction
E.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Program
* `2` - PaymentMethod
* `3` - Both

R.name: DateTimeValue
R.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

R.name: NumberValue
R.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

R.name: StringValue
R.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

Q.name: Operator
Q.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - Equals
* `1` - NotEquals
* `2` - LowerThan
* `3` - LowerThanOrEqualTo
* `4` - HigherThanOrEqualTo
* `5` - HigherThan
* `7` - Contains
* `8` - DoesNotContain
* `9` - StartsWith
* `10` - DoesNotStartWith
* `11` - EndsWith
* `12` - DoesNotEndWith
* `13` - HasValue
* `14` - DoesntHaveValue

I.name: ID
I.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 255 (incl) characters long.

H.name: ID
H.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 255 (incl) characters long.

H.name: MarketingDescription
H.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 200 (incl) characters long.

H.name: Name
H.description: This string must be between 1 (incl) and 127 (incl) characters long.

H.name: OrganizationUnitSetID
H.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnitSet`

T.name: ProductIDs
T.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

T.name: ProductSearchID
T.description: This is the ID of a `ProductSearchTemplate`

B.name: AllowUnsubscribeBy
B.description:
Indicates if the subscription can be unsubscribed and if so, who can do the unsubscribe.
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Subscriber
* `2` - Employee
* `3` - All

B.name: ApplyManuallyOnly
B.description:
When true, the loyalty program will not automatically be applied to the order when a customer is attached and all conditions are met.
When false, the loyalty program will automatically be applied if all conditions are met.

B.name: AutoSubscribeCustomer
B.description:
When true, if a non anonymous customer is attached to the order they will be automatically subscribed on finishing the order.
When false, the customer will not be subscribed.

This is ignore when`RequiresSubscribedCustomer` or `RequiresSubscriptionValidation` is set to true.

B.name: BudgetCurrencyID
B.description: This is the ID of a `Currency`

B.name: ID
B.description: This is the ID of a `LoyaltyProgram`

B.name: LoyaltyPointUsageOptions
B.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - AllowAwarding
* `2` - UsableAsPaymentMethod
* `4` - UsableForWithdraw

B.name: LoyaltyProgramGroupID
B.description: This is the ID of a `LoyaltyProgramGroup`

B.name: Options
B.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - EnablePaymentMethods
* `2` - EnableLoyaltyPoints
* `4` - EnableDiscounts

B.name: PriceLists
B.description: This is the ID of a `PriceList`

B.name: RequireCustomer
B.description:
When true, the loyalty program will only be applied when a customer is attached to the order.

When false, the loyalty program can be attached to the order even if there is no customer attached.

B.name: RequireManualUserIdentifier
B.description:
When set to true, subscribing the user will require a UserIdentifier to be given.
Attention!
This value will be used to create a subscription when either `RequiredCustomer` or `AutoSubscribeCustomer` is set to true.
When this is not the case on create, this can be introduced on update. This value cannot be changed after it is set in either the create or update.

B.name: RequiresSubscribedCustomer
B.description:
When true, the loyalty program will only be applied when a customer is attached to the order that is already subscribed to the loyalty program.
Also, this will make the `RequireCustomer` automatically true and `AutoSubscribeCustomer` false.

When false, the loyalty program can be attached to the order if a customer is attached that isn't already subscribed to the loyalty program.

B.name: RequiresSubscriptionValidation
B.description:
When true, the order will require that the attached customer on the order will be validated by providing the UserIdentifier in the `AttachBenefitProgramToOrder` service.
Also, this will make the `RequireCustomer` and `RequiresSubscribedCustomer` automatically true and `AutoSubscribeCustomer` false.

When false, this validation isn't required.

B.name: ResubscribeHandling
B.description:
Handling when a user is unsubscribed and re-subscribes.
Possible values:

* `0` - UpdateUserIdentifier
* `1` - KeepOriginalUserIdentifier
* `2` - Block

B.name: UserIdentifierPrefix
B.description:
Attention!
This value will be used to create a subscription when either `RequiredCustomer` or `AutoSubscribeCustomer` is set to true.
When this is not the case on create, this can be introduced on update. This value cannot be changed after it is set in either the create or update.

B.name: UserIdentifierStartNumber
B.description:
Attention!
This value will be used to create a subscription when either `RequiredCustomer` or `AutoSubscribeCustomer` is set to true.
When this is not the case on create, this can be introduced on update. This value cannot be changed after it is set in either the create or update.

B.name: UserIdentifierSuffix
B.description:
Attention!
This value will be used to create a subscription when either `RequiredCustomer` or `AutoSubscribeCustomer` is set to true.
When this is not the case on create, this can be introduced on update. This value cannot be changed after it is set in either the create or update.

V.name: Code
V.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

V.name: Message
V.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

V.name: RequestID
V.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

V.name: Type
V.description: A short description of the error type.

W.name: ExternalIDs
W.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

W.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
W.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

W.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
W.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
